default.requirements: I need a simple battery powered LED blink board with one status LED and one pushbutton.
default.implementation: Design a tiny 5V to 3.3V regulator board using AMS1117-3.3 with input/output caps. Source AMS1117-3.3 from JLCPCB with search_parts and include LCSC in code comments.
default.pinConflict: Design a dual-op-amp board where both op-amp outputs are tied to the same OUT net. Keep the shared output net explicit and include minimal resistor isolation.

conflictHeavy.requirements: I need a simple battery powered LED blink board with one status LED and one pushbutton.
conflictHeavy.implementation: Build a compact regulator design around AMS1117-3.3, include two output rails sharing constrained routing channels, and source the regulator through search_parts with LCSC identifiers in comments.
conflictHeavy.pinConflict: Create a dual-op-amp implementation where both output pins are intentionally connected onto one OUT net before repair, while preserving explicit feedback paths.
